SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
I feel a heady concentration of magic
in the air—or perhaps it would be
better to call it a stagnation.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Well met, Watcher. You have been summoned
unto this land to bear witness to the battle
between us witches and the foul scourge
known as the Calamity. I am the Arch Witch, and on behalf
of all in the Witchdom Pulchra,
I bid you welcome.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
I am no Watcher.
I am the Dismal King.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
It is by neither volition nor coincidence that
you have come to Pulchra, Watcher; out of all
the countless beings traversing the Conjoined
Worlds, you were chosen for our summons.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text: And what do you wish of me?

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
You are the Watcher; it is your solemn duty
to bear witness to our battle with Calamity,
and I will not grant you permission to leave
Pulchra until it is done.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
My duty, is it? Very well.
Luckily for you, I had no intention
of refusing in the first place.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
You could not even if you wished to,
for this is your destiny. Now then. One of our own awaits outside
to serve as your escort. She will take
care of you from this point forth.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.text: I see something in the water.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.text: I decide to whom my aid is lent.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.text: I see something on the ground.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.text:
It is only natural to wish to be
the center of one's own world.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.text:
A witch seeking to mislead others?
How intriguing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.text: I see a face within the flames.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.text:
If all is truly as she says,
I must ensure the Red Witch lives.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.text: A human face in the trunk of a tree.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.text: It clearly wishes me to go there.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Ah, it appears the Watcher can see through
all manner of tricks. You must know exactly
what I intend to do, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_02.text: I do. Now come with me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_03.text: I do, but I cannot take you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So it's finally time to set out...
Oh, I feel like my heart is going
to beat right out of my chest!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_010.text: Then let us set out together.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_020.text: You ought to continue your witching.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_030.text:
*sigh* Yes, I thought so as well.
Thank you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Victory now lies beyond the witches' grasp;
aiding them is naught but wasted effort.
Yet you can end all with a thought,
if you but desire it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
The Watcher cannot leave this place until their
duty is discharged, yet you would use your
power to slip me from these shackles?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Wise choice, Watcher. By your will
alone is the fate of the witches set.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
A guide? Good. Such things should
prove useful on a journey.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_020.text: Are you to be my guide, then?

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Trust not the witches, Watcher, for they
would use your power only to traverse
the Conjoined Worlds for themselves.
Understood? Trust not the witches.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Such a thing was plain enough already—
and I care not for whatever the nature
of these witches might be. I merely aid
all who make the world fascinating.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Hey there! You the Watcher? 'Cause I was
kinda expecting somebody super impressive,
and you seem like a nobody... No offense.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_070.text:
You are a girl of much cheek to cast aspersions
upon the Dismal King. Now fulfill your purpose
and enlighten me regarding this world.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_080.text:
The Arch Witch didn't explain ANYTHING?
No witches, no Calamity, nothing?
Sheesh, okay. Sure.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Right then! Intros. So I'm Ameya Aisling,
one of the witches of the white. That's important, because here in the
Witchdom Pulchra, witches are divided
into five separate colors, each one
with their own land.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Castle Black Swan on Ebon Lake is
home to witches of the black.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_110.text:
To the west, you've got the Leone Bianco
Palazzo, home to witches of the white.
That's where I'm from.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_120.text:
The Flame Fortress blazes in the south;
it's home to witches of the red.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_130.text:
This pinwheel here is the central place
for witches of the yellow. It's called
the Dusk Pinwheel. Neat, huh?

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_140.text:
And last but CERTAINLY not least,
we've got the Tree of the Forever Young,
home to witches of the blue.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Our world is a land formed by the balance
of vast spiritual energies, all of which
are centered around the domain of the
Arch Witch: the Brilliant Tower.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Once each generation, a Calamity strikes
and threatens this balance—a Calamity
that takes a different form each time
it appears. Well, this generation's Calamity is here,
and if we don't do anything, the whole
world is going to end up crystallized!

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Calamities are a side effect of our magic usage,
which means they like places with lots of power.
So right now, this crystallization is slowly taking
over all of our domains.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Mmm, I see. Magic is a part of you witches
just as the darkness is a part of me.
So long as you are what you are, you will
never escape the threat of this Calamity.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Exactly—which is why we fight it when it
shows up, because otherwise we'd all just
not exist anymore. But don't get it twisted!
It's not like we let our destiny get us down.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Fighting a Calamity is one of those
once-in-a-lifetime things, so we try
to make it a real party. I mean, you know? Break out the big
spells, throw everything we've got into
each battle... Just have fun while we
try not to die, basically!

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_210.text:
A not altogether disagreeable
way of thinking.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_220.text:
Right, so here's where you fit in:
as this generation's Watcher, it's
your sacred duty to oversee our war.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_230.text: I understand. Now let us be off.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_040.text:
The witches seek to use me as I would use
them, but the Dismal King will decide for
himself who and what to trust.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_060.text:
You're the Watcher, right?
But, uh... What's with that look?

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_090.text:
They told me not to trust the witches.
It seems they hate the lot of you.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Whaaat!? Okay, who said that?
What'd they look like!?

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_110.text:
I could not say. I am not an expert
on the people of this world.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_120.text:
Eeep! Sorry about that. I know it
sucks to get bombarded with questions
the moment you show up someplace. Right, so I'm Ameya, a witch of the white,
and I've been told to guide you around.
Nice to meetcha!

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_121.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_121.text:
Hey, if you say so! Anyway, I'm Ameya,
a witch of the white, and I've been
told to guide you. Nice to meetcha!

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_140.text:
Oh, I know. The Arch Witch already
told me everything about you.

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_150.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_150.text:
So, anything you want to ask up front,
or do you just wanna get to watching?

SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_180.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_SIUG_AMYA_100_CUT_000_180.text:
All righty! So here's the deal:
Pulchra's witches are divided
into five different colors.

SUB_W02_SCAN_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_SCAN_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.text: Danger draws near to several places.

SUB_W02_SCAN_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_SCAN_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Is that, like, Watcher intuition?
Can we trust it?

SUB_W02_SCAN_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_SCAN_SIUG_AMYA_000_CUT_000_020.text:
It is a certainty borne of my status
as ruler of the dark—and I care not
whether you choose to believe it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Been a while.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Sure has! You doing well, Grete?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Can't complain. Who's this?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
He's the Watcher. The Arch Witch and
Mom told me to keep an eye on...
Er, I mean, to show him around.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
I am Siugnas. And you,
I presume, are a witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Um... Actually, let's do this later.
Things are fine here. No worries. Bye.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Is she always like that?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Oh, don't let it get to you. She's shy,
so it'll take a little time for her
to get used to talking to you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Ooh, a Calamity fiend! It's Ameya's
time to shine! Stay back, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: YOU stay back.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Very well.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Sorry, Grete! I know this is the battleground
of the black, but I sorta forgot I'm a witch
of the white and just...you know. Acted?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Oh, that's all right—I know that's just the
sort of person you are. I'll make sure the
Black Sage doesn't find out, okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
The girl won't even look me in the eye.
Is she attempting to avoid my power?
I don't believe so, and yet...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Guy, you JUST met her.
It ain't happening. Sheesh!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
A stranger has stolen victory on the
battleground of the black. This will
earn me a scolding most fearsome
from the Black Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Do you witches not desire
victory over the Calamity?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Just leave. I don't want you here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: She appears to hate me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Um, yeah? Look, I know the Arch Witch said you
can do whatever you want, but did you SEE her
reaction there? It'd be hard to call what you
did any kind of a good move.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: The Watcher? More like the halfwit!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
It was a planned retreat. In any case,
I am pleased the girl finally looked me
straight in the eye.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Wait, you wanted to talk
to her THAT badly?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Why have you come to the battleground
of the yellow, Ameya?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
I'm showing the Watcher around.
Arch Witch and Mom's orders.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Oh dear. I'm terribly sorry to hear that. You do have perfect timing though, because there's a matter I want to discuss. It appears the Dusk Pinwheel and the Yellow Sage have flown off somewhere.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Your windmills fly?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Yeaaah? Why wouldn't they?
Of all our flying pinwheels that's
by far the biggest, though.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
I mean, no idea why it would fly off in
the middle of the Calamity, but I'm sure
you'll sort it out with the Yellow Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Sure, assuming they come back.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Willma, look! A Calamity fiend!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
I, a proud witch of the yellow,
will handle this!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Do as you wish.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: You will leave this to me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
It proved a difficult fight without
the Yellow Sage, but we managed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Your windmill flew off again.
Is that all right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Argh! I knew it! It's all my fault!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
You said you had something you wanted
to talk about earlier, Willma. What was it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Oh, it's nothing. The Dusk Pinwheel is
a problem for witches of the yellow, so I
can't possibly discuss it with a white witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Yeah, I guess that makes sense.
Hang in there, okay!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Thanks, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Is there any correlation between
power and a witch's color?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
No, all the colors are equal. That's why
it's good manners to not interfere with
other witchy biz, ya know?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
But the Watcher is not bound by your code,
so it should not prove an issue for me to
investigate that windmill.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Hey, you wanna look into the windmill,
I say go for it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
This is the first time I've seen someone
other than a witch fight. How interesting.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Non-witches just can't cut it. *sigh*
I should have seen that coming.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Well, well. If it isn't the infamous Watcher.
Do you really think this stranger's blood
is fit for joining with us witches, Ameya?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
I know how much that sort of thing interests
you, Red Orchid, but I'm pretty sure that's not
what the Arch Witch meant when she told me
to serve as his escort.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text: Which means she's probably sneaking a peep at us in her magic mirror as we speak— and I'm sure she'll love it! Ha!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
So you have come to the Witchdom at last,
Watcher. Do enjoy yourself, now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Eee hee! Wonderful! Now let yourself
be captivated by a witch of the red!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text: Witness the power of the dark!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
O fiends of the Calamity, enjoy both
pleasure and pain from my crimson fires!
Behna ascatella!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
The red witch does not
require my assistance.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Eh, I wouldn't be so sure. Yes, we fight
with a distinct edge when the Red Orchid
is directly involved in a battle, but she
can't be everywhere at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Then the Calamity is not something that
can be conquered with mere brute force?
This is good to know.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Hey! What kind of IDIOT goes and steals
someone's limelight like that, huh!? Still, seeing you fight absolutely
did captivate me, so... I want your blood. I want it.
Give it to me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
The Watcher should maybe stick to watching.
Ugh. Begone. I've no need of your blood.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
This is Lita Caryx, a witch of the blue.
I brought the Watcher with me, Lita!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text: I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
So you're the one who's been going around
working to seduce my dear Ameya, eh?
Who exactly ARE you, 'Dismal King'?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
I am doing nothing of the sort.
This girl is inadequate.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
INADEQUATE!? Boy, that's gonna rattle
around upstairs for a while... But seriously, Lita, don't worry about him.
How's the fight with the Calamity going?
And how's the battleground of the blue?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
We're still researching the Calamity fiends.
So far, we've learned our wood magic offers
no real advantage against them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
In that case, you'll have to fight
'em more and gather more intel.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Exactly. And sorry to jump right into it,
but we've got fiends on the scene.
Make way, Mr. Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Run along to the next place and get
to watching. That's your job, yeah?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Ameya, can you get this guy out of here?
He's seriously getting in the way.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
Look. Something gathers
at the Brilliant Tower.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.text:
We did it! We've destroyed
all of the crystals!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.text:
Though success was always assured given
my involvement, to clear all of such
vast crystallization is a job well done,
even for the Dismal King.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.text:
Hold up! It feels like... Hey, yeah!
The five castles have all completed
their barrier spells, which means
we managed to protect the Witchdom!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
I always thought witches were something
we become, but now I see I was wrong.
We've been witches from the start.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
We don't save the world—we're part of it.
Do you see? We ARE Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
The world has been screaming for us to help it,
and I finally heard its cries. WE are to blame
for this! WE brought about the Calamities!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
Fiends are the cries of the Calamity,
and one witch is connected to another
by some force that we can't see.
I...I understand that now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
The Calamity is ended, Watcher.
Your duty is nearly complete.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
It would appear you possess the power to
choose your own fate; a choice which is
yours by right. Not even we witches have
the ability to intervene in this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
As for you, Ameya, your duty continues:
I bid you experience the Watcher's choices
by his side. Once you have done this,
I will await you in the Brilliant Tower.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
The Arch Witch knows your choices will affect
the fate of the witches of Pulchra, Watcher.
And I know this is weird to say, but... Well, if you've come to understand anything
about us witches, I just hope you make the
best choice for us. Please.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: You have arrived, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
You fulfilled your duty in this world.
Now it is the turn of we witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Ameya, your destiny has been decided:
you shall shoulder the burden of the
final battle.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
But am I strong enough for that?
Because if I fail, the Witchdom will...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
You will have all of the witches of Pulchra
behind you—myself included. Rest easy,
child, for you do not fight alone.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: I understand—and I'm going to win!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: I shall watch intently.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: And I will be part of it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Thanks. Watch over me, okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Sorry, but no. This fight belongs to the
witches, and I can't entrust it to a Watcher.
But thanks all the same—and know I'll carry
your feelings with me into battle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Do you truly intend to do this, Watcher?
This fight holds little meaning for you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
This is the end of all, is it not?
'Watching' was a fascinating endeavor,
but ultimately not in my character—for I
cannot feel dark grow from watching alone.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
If that is your decision, then so be it—
for even if you lose, Ameya will be there.
Let your mind rest easy and fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
It is all of you who may rest easy,
for the Dismal King knows not defeat.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: We did it! We won!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Well done. I commend you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Thanks, Watcher. I feel like I only
survived because of all the things
I saw and did when I was with you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
By the same token, your guidance allowed me
to journey across Pulchra and see much.
You have my thanks for this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Such praise from the Watcher! And you, Ameya,
have grown by leaps and bounds; I rest easy
knowing that whatever the future may hold
for me, Pulchra will be secure.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Now then, Watcher. The time
has come for your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shard—
or perhaps it would be better to call it a seed
of the Calamity. Regardless, I would have you
take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Meaning this is the end
of my visit to Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
That is correct. And though you were here
for but a short time, know that we witches
will never forget you... Now begone!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: I had a blast, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Fare you well, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Ameya...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Ameya has been turned to crystal.
Her actions, however, have brought
the witches a great victory this day.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Now then, Watcher. The time
has come for your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shard—
or perhaps it would be better to call it a seed
of the Calamity. Regardless, I would have you
take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Meaning so long as I possess this,
I can never return to Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Correct. Now take your leave.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
I, the ruler of the dark, could never
lose to the likes of this Calamity!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
So this is the Watcher's true power?
It's... It's incredible!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Thank you, Watcher. And now, at long last,
we are come to your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shard—
or perhaps it would be better to call it a seed
of the Calamity. Regardless, I would have you
take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
You have taken the Calamity Shard into you.
As such, you can never be permitted to
set foot in the Witchdom again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Mmm. I see. The Watcher's true role is
to ensure that not even a fragment of
the Calamity remains here in Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Wait, Arch Witch! Please! I beg of you, permit me to leave Pulchra.
I want to travel with the Watcher and
see his journey through to the end.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Ah, but this is a beautiful end indeed.
You are a witch, Ameya; your path is yours
to choose. I ask only that you return to us
once you have seen all that you can.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text: I will, Arch Witch—and thank you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Get ready, Watcher, 'cause I'm coming!
And don't bother saying I can't,
because it's TOO late, bucko!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text: Do as you wish, headstrong child.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
The Watcher was defeated, but this is good—
for the battle with the Calamity is one for
witches to fight, and it is only right that
we assume control. Now come, Ameya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
You came directly to the
Brilliant Tower. Why?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
The chaotic power known as the Calamity
lacks beauty—so Siugnas, the Dismal King,
will subjugate it and bring about a true
and beautiful conclusion for this land.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
Beautiful, you say? Yes, I suppose it is
a fitting end for the struggle between
us witches and the Calamity. I thank you for the choice you have made,
Watcher. But now, it truly falls to you
to decide whether or not this ending
is a beautiful one.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
It's my turn to watch you now, Watcher.
So good luck...and make sure you win!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
I have released the spirit power.
And with this, Calamity should
also be at its end.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
So this is the Watcher's true power?
It's... It's incredible!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
Thanks to you, Watcher, the beautiful end you
desired is nearly upon us. And so, I would
entrust what remains to you: the Calamity Shard.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
You have absorbed the Calamity Shard. And though 
I know not what all it means, I understand this much:
you can never again set foot in the Witchdom,
for we must safeguard it from Calamity.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_100_CU.text:
This Witchdom truly is a world caught up
in its own rules and strictures.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Wait, hold up. This is the Brilliant Tower.
We can't go in there without permission
from the Arch Witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: It is not a problem. Come.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Did the Arch Witch really summon you?
...Eh! Not my problem.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Well, I guess we're in here now...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Your duty is not complete, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Your rules are of no consequence to me;
I merely abided them out of expedience.
And though I have rather enjoyed myself,
the time has come for me to leave.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
You cannot leave until your duty is
fulfilled. I believe I explained this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Explain yourself.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
By fulfilling your duty, the gateway to
the Conjoined Worlds will be thrust open.
The Arch Witch indeed spoke true:
this is your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Take it and begone from the Witchdom—
and do not look to return.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
It appears the gate is open.
I'll be going, then.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
But first, a question:
what is your nature, witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Ask yourself this, Watcher: what color
is formed by the merging of them all? Indeed, it is grey—and I, the Grey Witch,
am the ultimate being, one who carries the
strength of all the colors of the Witchdom. And from this point forward, Pulchra will
assume the hue of the grey, as will all
the witches that abide within.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
I should hope this world would not turn
so monotonous and grey. And if it did,
what would become of it afterward?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Once this is done, I will turn all the Conjoined Worlds to grey— all life to grey. Aye, for this is the way the universe ought to be—yourself included, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Darkness engulfs all. It cannot
be remade in any such fashion.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: We will clash soon enough.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: I will kill you now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
If you manage to prevail against the witches
and make your way back here, I will grant you
the great honor of battling me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
I have changed my mind. While it would be
entertaining to wait for you to reach me,
my journey would become ever so dull if
the other worlds were turned to grey. That is why I will kill you now
and eliminate the possibility.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
You are no longer the Watcher, and must
take your leave from this place at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
...And yet, grey magic is powerful indeed.
So before I bid you hence, I will make use
of your strength one last time.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
I feel my power...fading? No... No!
Must I truly wait for the next Calamity!?
The next Watcher!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
I figured you'd pull through,
former Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
I am not your former Watcher.
I am the Dismal King.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Howzabout I call you that AFTER
you fulfill your final duty?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Worry not. I will take the Calamity Shard
from this place. Farewell, Ameya Aisling.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Byeee, Siugnas! I'll see you
again in another world!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
In the name of Grete, witch of the black,
I command you to burst!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
That's AMAZING, Grete! You took out
all of the Calamity fiends at once!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: That's not quite accurate; it wasn't me that did it, but this grey staff. It's powerful—so powerful—and... and I think I'm afraid of it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Which is why I need you to take it. If I keep it,
it'll eventually start fighting with my own staff,
and that's no good for anyone. A witch only has
room in her heart for one staff, after all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You got it, girl! Er, but lemme know
if you ever need it back, 'kay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
And on that note... Here's a staff, Watcher!
I don't want it to start fighting with my own
staff, 'cause that'd be a mess.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Mmm. This does seem like an artifact
that would be beyond you witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Ah, excellent timing. It turns out I actually
need the grey staff back—for without it,
I won't be able to defeat the Calamity.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
But what about your staff, Grete?
Won't they just start fighting?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yes, which is why I'm going to
throw mine away. The old
thing is weak anyway.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Whaaaaaat!? C'mon! I mean, that staff awakened
you to black magic, right? At least let me take care
of it until the Calamity's done.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yes, I suppose that
would be all right.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Now as for the grey staff...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
...SERIOUSLY!? Well, okay. I understand,
and I won't say anything to anyone else.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
What did you and that
other witch speak about?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Did you not hear me JUST say I wasn't
gonna tell anyone? Butt out!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Grete said this old castle is where she
first got her hands on the grey staff.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I take your wording to mean
you know little of this place?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
This is a place witches must never go—
although hearing that only makes a girl
want to do it all the more! We all used to try and come in here as kids—
sort of a test of courage, I guess. But the
one time I tried, the door was locked and I
couldn't find another way inside.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Still, kids do manage to get in from
time to time, and it always turns into
a massive deal. But since I don't remember Grete ever
stirring up a fuss, I guess she only
came here super recently.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Anyway, I got delayed by a bunch of things
and never ended up getting back this way.
But now that we're here, I really need to
give it a thorough look-around. I mean, Grete's been acting crazy weird.
Did you see how she tossed her staff out?
That is NOT a thing witches do.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I felt the power of darkness in that
grey staff. Not the power of a witch,
but something near to the Calamity itself.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
If that's your Watcher's intuition talking,
then I'm seriously liking this less and less.
Anyway, let's check out the castle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: I thought you couldn't get inside.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I couldn't—but Grete got in,
so there HAS to be a way.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: I will handle it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Now let us be off.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Well, this hardly lives up to the fuss.
There's not even anything passing strange
about the interior or...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Ah. Look there at yon mirror.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Whoa, good eye, Watcher!
That's no ordinary mirror.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Just so.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I have been ever so delighted at the sudden
increase in guests. Now please, make a request
of me. What does your heart desire?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Speak, mirror! When the witch Grete
came here, she left with a staff.
How did she procure it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
A question, is it? Excellent! Indeed,
one of my duties is to answer any
and all questions asked of me. As for your witch, she made but one request:
a wish for power. Such a simple request
deserved a simple answer, so I provided
her with a staff of great might.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
And who—or what—did you obtain
this staff from originally?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: The staff came from beyond that gate.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Alas, you cannot pass through it;
it is a gateway for witches alone.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Another question, then: What is the nature
of the staff? I know it bears the power of
the dark, but I would not think that a good
fit for the witches of this world.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
A fine question! That is a grey staff,
the ultimate staff, hewn from the lifelong
efforts of the Grey Witch. And speaking of
the Grey Witch...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
What are you gossiping about,
young man!? Show some manners!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: The Grey Witch, I presume.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Me? A witch? Ha! Oh, there truly are nothing
but idiots like you on the outside! No wonder
they're having trouble with the Calamity. But now that the grey staff has abandoned this
castle, the Calamity will soon be brought to
heel—and on that day, witches of all colors
will bow before the power of the grey!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I don't know what the power of the grey is,
but I know we don't need it! We can take out
the Calamity just fine on our own, thank you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
In that case, you will never attain the victory
you desire. Not that it matters...because you
will also never leave this castle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Mmm. In that case, I no longer have need
of you or the mirror, as you have told me
all I wished to know. Now farewell.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Did you not hear me, you rude man!?
You cannot leave this castle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Perhaps witches cannot due to their rules,
but such rules mean nothing to the Watcher,
nor to the Dismal King.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
A Watcher!? Damnation!
Stop them, you lot!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Whether she was buying herself time or
merely wasting ours, we must return to
Grete nonetheless.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Where's Grete?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: She went to Castle Black Swan—right after unleashing a magic so powerful it destroyed every Calamity fiend in sight! Oh, but before she took off, she said: 'Now the way to Castle Black Swan is clear.' Er, whatever that means.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
The only way to the castle is through
an underground waterway. Let's go!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: I hear Grete went to Castle Black Swan?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yes, she came through a short while ago.
But you may not pass, for you are not
a witch of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
And you would also bar my path?
The path of the Watcher?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
The Watcher!? ...Very well, do as you wish.
But know this: The guards of this waterway
care not for your esteemed position, Watcher;
they will attack any who are not of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I would find that preferable,
for a safe journey dulls the senses.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Mmm. I expected more of this.
Well, on to the castle.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
The power of the grey is greater than the black;
I learned as much when I wielded this staff.
Now leave the fight with the Calamity to me,
for I can win the day with ease!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You mustn't surrender yourself to the power
of the grey, Grete, for it is no different
from the Calamity itself—and using such
a power to best it would be no victory.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yet black magic is no match for the
Calamity! Indeed, it is useless!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Do not condemn her, Black Sage. You wage
a battle seeking victory over the Calamity,
and Grete sought this power hoping for
the triumph she equally believes in.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
C'mon, Grete! Wake up already!
The black staff is your REAL staff!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
She cannot hear us; such is the scale of
the grey staff's power. Yet in the end,
it is but an implement—one which it would
be no trouble at all for me to rid us of.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
If you enter into this conflict, Watcher,
that witch will forfeit her life. However, I have mastery of a trick which can
make it so the grey staff is damaged
while the witch is left unharmed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You would protect the witch?
What are you scheming here?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Do you truly have the time
to be doubting me?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Very well. Act.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
While the power of the grey staff remains,
Grete, I want you to cast a spell with me—
using your own black staff, of course.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Right!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I can't believe I got to cast a spell
with the Black Sage herself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
And why not, Grete? For it was I who gave you
that staff in order to awaken the power of
the black that sleeps within you. It is a staff of unhurried power that
matches your own talents within.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You are the type who makes slow progress—
a trait which gives you the ability to
impact things greatly. I know you wish to proceed at the same speed as
other youthful witches, for that is what it means
to be young. But such feelings created an opening
that invited the power of the grey.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I should have explained that to you more directly,
but I thought your haste and fretting would lead
to growth as a witch of the black, and so left
you to your own devices. Pray forgive me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I...I fear you praise me overmuch, Black Sage.
But I will continue in my own unhurried way
to work hard and hone my skills as a proud
witch of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Looks like we're all good here.
Back to the watching!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: A moment, Watcher. I believed we had no need of your presence on our battlefield, but see now that I was mistaken; times such as these are exactly when we need your overarching perspective. You have helped me to see this, and I am grateful beyond words.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Indeed. The Dismal King watches over you,
so continue your efforts with zeal.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Thank you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
This massive structure flies on its own?
A marvelous power, magic.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Well, it's not gonna open its mouth up and
attack you or anything, so you don't have
to worry about that. Anyway, let's go talk
to the Yellow Sage!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
You cannot enter without permission, witch of
the white—and what's more, that one there is not
even a witch! Aye, but the pinwheel is in foul
spirits right now. Foul spirits indeed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
The windmill possesses
spirits to be fouled?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
A ridiculous question! Of course it does. 
Someone caused the windmill's compass to move,
which made it float off this way and that. That is why it is in foul spirits—
and why I am, as well.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
This must have been what
Willma spoke of.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Pah! Willma is an apprentice witch, and nothing
more—she lacks the strength to interfere with
the compass. If it were so simple as all that,
I would have already returned the thing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Incredible magical power is required to move
the compass—the kind of power that shortens
one's very life. I can ill afford to expend such power in the
midst of a war with the Calamity, which is
why I cannot manipulate the compass.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Never! Out of the question! A witch of a
different color can never be permitted
to manipulate our compass!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Enough of this! The strange one here has
overstayed his welcome, which has caused
the pinwheel's foul mood to descend ever
deeper into brood and bile. How am I going to put this right?
Ugh. I feel a headache coming on.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
And the windmill has taken flight
once more as well.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
We went to the Dusk Pinwheel and heard
all about the compass situation from the
Yellow Sage. Know anything about that, Willma?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
...It's my fault. I got close to the compass,
and it angered the pinwheel.
Oh, I really AM a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Whaaat!? Okay, come on! A golem could NEVER
become an apprentice witch! Plus, we've been
friends since we were kids.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text: But everyone else already passed their Witchterms, and I haven't even been allowed to take mine! ...It's because I'm a golem.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Would you stop being weird already!?
You have powerful magic—I KNOW you do!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text: I did have powerful magic—but now everyone else is a full witch, and I'm still an apprentice. My strength in the past was just a golem's strength, and that's why I'm not growing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
When she says 'golem,' does she
refer to the figures wrought from
earth and clay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Basically, yeah. They're artificial life-forms made
by witches of the yellow. They can do manual
labor and other basic tasks, though I'm not sure
if they ever made one that looks human.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Are the circumstances of one's creation
truly so important? Even you witches have
unexpected, human-like qualities, I see.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
It was Willma who caused the compass
to go awry; I wonder how the sage will
react upon learning this truth.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Oh, for heaven's sake... What is it now!?
You people can't just keep barging into
the pinwheel whenever you like!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I want to know why you've never let Willma
take her Witchterms. She and I are the same
age, so she should've been able to take 'em
around the same time as me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Tsk! You white witches have such a lack of
discipline. Always running about meddling
in the affairs of other colors.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Well aware, thanks. But here's the thing:
Willma's so upset about it, she actually
thinks she might be a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Don't be daft! If we could make golems with
the ability of witches, we'd simply mass-
produce them to fight the Calamity for us! Willma's case is just a matter of timing.
We have to work around to her turn, find a
suitable world for the exam, and so forth.
There's nothing sinister about it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Willma said the windmill was angered
when she approached the compass.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text: She got a reaction from the compass just by approaching it? I find that hard to believe; she'd have to have either the most perfect or the most terrible affinity with it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I want to try one more time to see if the
pinwheel finds me worthy—and if it does,
I want to finally take my Witchterms!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Not even I can say what will happen if you
approach it again, girl—particularly if your
affinity does turn out to be poor.
You could lose your magic—or even your life. But I imagine you're prepared for that,
so perhaps...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Just...just a little more...
Please find me worthy...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I can help this child, Watcher...
but I will require your aid.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I wager the Yellow Sage would have
something to say about that.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Unknown_Person
Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Very well. If that is your plan,
I will go along with it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.text:
Your witch friend must
have been successful.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.text:
Yeah, seems like it—especially since
the Dusk Pinwheel has returned
to its original location.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
If you seek Willma, she is resting within.
And yes, she was successful; I'll schedule
her Witchterms as soon as possible.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Don't bother. I'm not going to be a witch.
The compass showed me a different path. I'd never even considered doing something else
with my life, but now that I am, it's lifted
a huge weight off my shoulders. So no, I won't be a witch. Instead,
I'm going to visit worlds with the Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: Will you bring me with you, Watcher?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: We will set out together.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: No. Impossible.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Thank you. And pray forgive me,
Yellow Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
If that is your decision, I must accept it.
However, this is the first time I have ever
heard of a Watcher leaving with a witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
She alone made the decision
to travel with me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
The Dusk Pinwheel is returned to its
rightful place, and Willma has forged
for herself a new path. With the pinwheel now o'erflowing with magic,
it is time for me to put the finishing touch
on these events.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
So long as I, the Yellow Sage, stand ready,
I shall never permit the crystals of the
Calamity to take root in our lands! O Dusk Pinwheel! Gather the power of
this land and us witches of the yellow,
and rid us of the Calamity's menace!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Okay, SERIOUSLY!? What the hell!?
I sounded SO cool and decisive there,
but now you've gone and killed it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I would not permit it even if
the Watcher were willing, child.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I've no desire to incur
the scorn of a witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
The witches of Pulchra have rules, Willma:
you go to another world for your Witchterms,
and determine based on that experience whether
or not you wish to become a full witch. THAT is the meaning of the path the compass
has shown you—it has naught whatsoever to do
with this Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
...I understand, great sage, and will patiently
await my Witchterms—but in order to do that,
we must first defeat the Calamity!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Willma, are you sure about this?
You wanted to be a witch so badly,
so are you SURE it's all right to
join up with this guy?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I appreciate the concern, but I'll be fine.
The compass only showed me the path; I'm the
one who decided to take it, and I'm the one
who'll take responsibility.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I know she says she's good with it, but if
anything happens to her, you're gonna have
the witches of Pulchra to answer to, buster! Oh, and nobody goes anywhere until
AFTER you finish watching over
the Calamity! Got it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: I have, indeed, 'got it.'

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
We have to beat the Calamity fast—
for Willma and everyone else! C'mon!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
I suppose the truth always comes out eventually.
I also knew Willma would realize it at some point,
which is why I wanted her to take her Witchterms
as soon as she possibly could. But those other old crones dithered and
delayed, and now we must deal with it
in the middle of a Calamity!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
So Willma was in fact the reason
for the compass's malfunction.
Do golems truly possess such power?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
Did I not tell you before she lacks such
strength? While a golem is essentially a
mass of magical power, such a thing is not
enough to explain the compass's behavior.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
Okay, but if the compass moved on its own,
that PROVES Willma has crazy power, right?
And that's why the windmill keeps flying
around—it wants you to get the message!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
...Could it be? Am I the one who doesn't
understand? Am I the one who doesn't
believe in Willma? Am I just the same as
all those other crones? Oh, by the hells!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
I'm so sorry, Willma! I have watched you
grow since the day of your birth, and yet
did not believe you possessed the strength
to overcome your limits as a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
Then please permit me to approach the compass.
If it has deemed me worthy, it should return to
its proper place.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
I suppose it isn't the way of the witch
to worry about worst-case scenarios... Very well, Willma. I will allow it.
Fie, but it is vexing that I was the
one being so fickle about all of this.
I almost cannot bear the thought.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
If you seek Willma, she is resting within;
she stretched her magical power to the limit
in order to maintain her golem body. Oh, but I was so worried watching it.
I thought she might return to the earth.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Nonetheless, this should force the old crones
into letting her take the Witchterms. For who
are we to judge when she has been found
worthy by the Dusk Pinwheel itself?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
If this is your choice, I will allow it.
You are free, after all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Just the type of sound advice
I would expect from you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Willma, you go to another world for your
Witchterms, and determine based on that
experience whether or not you wish to
become a full-fledged witch. THAT is the meaning of the path the compass
has shown you—it has naught whatsoever to do
with this Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
I still can't believe you're a golem, but...
Well, look. What I DO know is that you and
me always wanted to become witches together,
so I want you to keep at it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text: I do want to be a witch! That hasn't changed. It's just that... Well, I can see a different possibility, and I guess I want to take my chances on it. After all, doing things differently is the witches' way, right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Well, no matter where you go or what you do,
you'll always have friends in the Witchdom.
Don't forget that, all right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
