You can take Willma with you once you're
done overseeing the Calamity, Watcher.
Until then, she needs to continue performing
her duties as a witch of the yellow.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text: Psst! Hey, have you heard the gossip?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Ooo, hot goss? Spill it! Uh, I mean, I'm not sure we
should gossip around...you know?
Watch watch? Hint hint? Nudge nud—

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Cease this absurdity!
See here, witch of the white:
I, the Dismal King, will incline
my ear to your scuttlebutt.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Okay, so here's the deal:
two witches of the white are MISSING!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Such things are not unexpected in times
of war. They either lost their lives to
the Calamity, or took heel and fled.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Nuh-uh! See, 'cause when we go into battle,
we cast enchantments that ensure we have
a complete understanding of each other's
locations before we even engage the enemy.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
So no matter where a witch goes, we always
know just where she is—even if she gets
turned to crystal!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
I should think the answer even
more obvious, in that case.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
No, man! It's NOT obvious! If we lose the battle
with the Calamity, witches won't even be able
to BE witches anymore! There's nowhere TO run,
and both of these witches would know that!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Noble, majestic creatures you witches may be,
yet you still have but one life afforded you.
I should think it a natural thing to prioritize
such over the concept of a witchly existence.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
There isn't a witch in the world who wants
to lose to the Calamity! No, I'm sure they
just got wrapped up in something or other. And look, I know your Watcher stuff is
important and all, but I'm gonna try
and find these missing witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
I will not stop you.
Where shall we look?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
We'll look, um... Somewhere?
Did you hear anything about
where they were going?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Fine timing, m'lady! We just saw two people who
looked like the missing witches enter the mine.
We were going to pursue them, but thought we
should let the witches know first.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
That was the right decision: Spirits are
known to appear in this mine, so it would
be super dangerous for you squires to go
poking around. Just wait for us, 'kay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Of course, m'lady.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Why in the world would those two
have wandered into a mine?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Do witches require resources
from mines? Rocks, perhaps?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Of course! I mean, we can do anything with
enough magic, but having stuff like ore lets
us create things more easily—and with less
magical power—than we could otherwise.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I cannot possibly imagine witches sullying
themselves with the dirt and muck required
to excavate items from the earth.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
And thankfully, we don't have to!
Here, I'll show you how it's done.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Oh, there's a good one!
It's perfect for your first time.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Is that what you witches call 'mining'?
Slaughtering fiends?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I mean, kinda? We let the fiends dig stuff up,
then we just...y'know! Have 'em share a little.
A totally respectable mining operation, right?
Anyway, here. Have some of what they dropped.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
So the fiends are akin to thralls
for you? Mmm. I understand now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, they're not, like, our familiars or
anything, but I suppose you're close enough.
Anyway, now you know how we mine, so we
can get back to looking for the lost witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Whoa! Cave-in! You okay!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Always.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Talk about your bad luck though, huh?
Anyhoo, let's light things up a bit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Your magic is a convenience to be sure.
Yet surely we could also avail ourselves
of it to locate your missing witches?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Hmmm... I mean, magic isn't all-powerful
or anything, but I suppose I could see
if they left any traces behind.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Hello? Anyone there!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Help has arrived!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Here they are!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We felt a rumbling from the direction of the mine
and came to investigate. We thought it strange
that there were two squires at the entrance,
so we went deeper and voila! Here you are.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Goodness! You're the Watcher, aren't you?
Oh, but this is just our lucky day!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Those two squires claimed to have
seen the missing witches enter,
and so we came in search of them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Missing witches...? Ah, I see. Those
squires must be spreading the rumors.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, as you can clearly see,
we're not missing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Then you are the witches we seek?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
It certainly seems that way—though I don't
have the faintest idea why they're telling
everyone we've gone missing. Perhaps those
squires just have it out for you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Ha! I can't wait to see the look on their
faces when they learn the subjects of their
little rumorfest showed up to help you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
And with that, we're going after them.
Be well, you two!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Indeed. Our thanks.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We went in to save them, but ended up
GETTING saved. Man, I really panicked
there for a bit, huh? Guess I was just
worried they might really have run off.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Such is life.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Psst! Hey, have you heard the gossip?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
If you mean the one about how two 'missing'
witches ended up rescuing the Watcher's
party from a cave-in, then we heard it. 
Also, not gossip. Super real. Source: me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I hear they were even praised for their
actions by the White Sage herself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Sounds about right. Meanwhile, I almost
got the Watcher KILLED! Mom's gonna let
me have it for sure. Ugh.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Aw, cheer up! Gloom isn't like you.
That said, we need to catch those
two suspicious squires on the double.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Oh no! This time I'M gonna be the one
to catch 'em and totally redeem myself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Ever restless, aren't you?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Impeccable timing, Watcher. We just chased
those two squires into the greenhouse,
and you were here to see it all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Leave catching those two to me.
We actually talked to 'em last time,
so I'll know if it's them or not.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Yes, I suppose even a lowly squire can't
be taken into custody without evidence.
Go on—one of us will be right behind you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
The structure looked small on
the outside. More magic, then.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We'll get lost if we aren't careful;
I don't even know how big this place is.
Oh, and don't let your guard down,
or you'll totally end up as plant food.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Our errant squires may already have met
just such a fate; it beggars belief that
they might take refuge in such a place.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I'll start searching here, Watcher.
Why don't you head in that direction?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I saw the squires over there!
After them, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: There.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Where?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Maybe this way?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Not squires, but something else.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: There's no end to this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Are you all right, Watcher!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Yes. But what of the squires?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Unfortunately, the squires were supper.
All that's left is their armor.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Mmm, I see.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
They truly got themselves eaten? Fools!
And with my opportunity to witness their
darkness lost, let this end the matter.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, that's a bummer. Now we'll never
know what they were after you for.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Then let us ask them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
What, like with necromancy? No!
That's one of Pulchra's forbidden
schools of magic!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well then, why not seek the aid of
your mother, the White Sage?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
You want me to ask MOM for help!?
Also, help with what?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: All will become clear anon.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
The Watcher would like to do some mining, and he
wishes for all of you to accompany him. He would
also like to give you the fruits of this labor
as thanks for the times you have aided him.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I ask that you accept his proposal for two
reasons. First, it is a kind offer, and you
have most definitely earned his thanks.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: But also, I wish to observe him, for I can't help but wonder why he wants to mine for ore in the midst of the Calamity. Please report back if you learn anything suspicious.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Of course.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: With pleasure.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well? How was that? As you see,
I told the truth, even if it
was not the entirety of it. That said, I admit to harboring some doubts
about you, Watcher, because you are most
certainly hiding something. Is there some
reason you're being targeted?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: A mysterious voice speaks to me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: I hide nothing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
An unknown voice implored me
not to trust witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
The owner of this voice spoke neither
of their identity, nor their aims.
That is the extent of what I know.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I appreciate your honesty, and may have an
inkling who this mysterious voice belongs to.
Regardless, it seems you are VERY important
to them, Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Now please make your way to the mines.
They will grow suspicious if you're late.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
What are you scheming here,
Grey Witch...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
My thanks for accepting my request.
I expect much of the both of you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: We'll dig up lots of good stuff!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Ameya claims there are
spirits in this mine.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
There have been occasions in which a spirit
attracts a ghost—it's truly terrifying.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Agreed. Ghosts are the WORST.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Do not fear. I am with you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Thanks!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: It's a little dark.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: It doesn't get any brighter.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Why... Why did you kill...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: EEEK! S-S-SQUIRE GHOST!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: But... But how is this possible?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: B-b-b-but...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Melting... I'm melting...
My body is melting away...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Nooo! I'm sorry, Mr. Ghost!
Please forgive me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Okay, now this is just getting annoying.
Enough tricks, spirit! Why are you showing
us some imaginary squire ghost!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Don't run... Take me with you...
Take my hand...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Eeek! No, don't hold my hand!
Wait, you CAN'T hold my hand!
I'm YOU! You're ME! Noooooo!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: That ought to suffice.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Fortuitous indeed that your associate has such
a fear of ghosts. The Dismal King gave himself
fully to his role, which proved worthwhile.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
You knew there were no squires
from the very beginning?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Of course—for I rule the darkness.
Clad yourself in armor or cloak your
appearance, but the darkness within
can never be disguised.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
So what now? Will you reveal our scheme
and hand us over to the White Sage?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I will do nothing, save keep watch
over the end you choose.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I would ask a question, however:
Have you heard a voice of late,
one imploring you not to trust witches?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Uh, no? I mean, what kind of idiot would
tell a witch not to trust a witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Mmm. Indeed. Then with our business
concluded, I would ask you to begone.
But do not forget I will be watching,
whether you choose fight or flight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I can't believe the two of them actually
thought that would work! Man, maybe
I'm not that good at judging people...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: You are fine as you are.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
This man is no witch,
but who—or what—is he?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Pulchra is populated by both witches and the
squires who serve them. This guy's a squire,
so he serves witches. Make sense?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
It saddens me to hear the two of you speak so
indifferently toward a beleaguered squire such as
I, for is it not a rule of this world that we should
offer words of support to social lessers?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Though I know nothing of the rules which
bind your society, I will hear you out.
Speak your troubles to the Dismal King.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
How very kind of you to ask! You see, m'lord,
I am a squire who uses a particular set of
skills in service to witches of the red. Alas, I have recently been given commands by both
the honorable Red Sage and her glorious elder
sister, the Red Orchid, and now find myself at
a loss over whose order I should prioritize.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Hierarchically, I should put the Red Sage above
all others. The Red Orchid, however, has always
held my skill in high esteem, and I should like
to prove she is not mistaken in that evaluation.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: And what have they asked of you?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The Red Sage has commanded me to assassinate
the Red Orchid. The Red Orchid, conversely,
has baded me assassinate the Red Sage. I believe the term for my skills would be
'wetwork' in some circles? But to put a
finer point on it, I am an assassin.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I beg you, m'lord! Help me solve this
most vexatious of workplace conundrums!
Whose order should I carry out?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: You should ignore the orders.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: You must slay them both.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Those two are ALWAYS fighting about
one thing or another, so just ignore it. I mean, just because you're a squire doesn't
mean you need to take every word they say
seriously—especially when they're trying to
put hits out on each other!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'll go get them to make up—and since
I think this qualifies as 'watching,'
you can come, too.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
...Ignore a witch's command?
I've never considered such a thing!
Could I truly get away with it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
...Indeed, it is only by carrying out both
sets of orders that I can honor all the tasks
entrusted to me. That seems the best way
I can fulfill my duties in their entirety!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Are relations between the
red sisters truly so sour?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The Red Sage is the Red Orchid's little sister—
and the Red Orchid is one of the most powerful
witches in all Pulchra. But here's the thing: nobody knows how the
Red Orchid feels about being passed over
for sage in favor of her little sister.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Also, the people around them are constantly
running off on some random whim or another,
which doesn't help matters.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
What errand brings you here, Watcher?
I hardly need you to look after me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I heard tell of a pair of sisters each
attempting to have the other assassinated.
I came to ascertain the 'lay of the land'
between you, as it were.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So the Red Orchid put out her own order,
did she? I always knew we were alike
in some rather strange ways. However, your concern is unwarranted,
because I do not fear assassination.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I look forward to witnessing how the
squire you've tasked with your fell
deeds chooses to handle the situation.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
AAANYWAY, we need the two of you to make up.
If there's anything we can do to help that along,
we'll do it—'cause this is no time for two of our
best witches to be fighting!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I know how foolish this all must seem to you,
given the times we now find ourselves in.
But in truth, the course of events often
hinges upon such things as this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
There is something in the Scorching Tower
that hails from our memories; I wonder if
my sister recalls it? The answer to that question could cause us
to lay down our arms—or more specifically,
to point them at the Calamity instead
of one another.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Tower, memories, got it. We'll swing by
the Red Orchid's place and let her know.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
What errand brings you to
this battlefield?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
There's something from your memories in the
Scorching Tower—something you share with
your sister. Do you remember what it is?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Do you take me for a fool?
I'm not so absent-minded as
to forget something like that! But also, this is none of your business.
I understand her feelings and what she's
attempting to do, and that is enough.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So I can assume you two are gonna
make up and NOT kill each other?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
You can. I will set off for
the Flame Fortress at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
After reflecting on things, I realize
ordering your assassination was...
Well, let's call it overkill.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I feel exactly the same, Sister.
Also, I can't believe you remembered it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Yes, and I'll never forget it.
Not for the rest of my life.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: A drink for m'ladies, if it please?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
You? Bringing us tea? Oh ho ho!
Sister, this tea is clearly poisoned.
I advise you to drink it with care.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Worry not, sister of mine: I've cast an
enchantment on myself that detoxifies
everything that I consume.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: GYAAA!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The slimy cur put a poisoned needle
on the CUP instead of in the drink!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Just so, Red Orchid! The tea was a mere
distraction so you might lower your
guard regarding the cup itself. At last, I have done it! Not even
the great Red Orchid was able to
see through my deception!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Sister...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: I'm sorry...Zhu Ya...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I have done it! I carried out both
sets of orders at the same time!
What a great success!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
THEY JUST MADE UP, YOU CHOWDERHEAD!
WHAT THE HECK ARE YOU DOING!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Wait, really? Oh. Oh no.
What HAVE I done!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
An unexpectedly dull ending to see the pair
of them slain; it would be far better for
them to attempt to kill each other forever.
Do you perhaps carry an antidote, squire?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Errr... No. But I can make one,
provided I have a scale from
the Salamander!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Sounds like we're headed to
the Scorching Tower! C'mon!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: There's the assassin!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Get in the tower! Quick!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
What now? The longer we delay,
the closer the witch sisters
slip toward blissful oblivion.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
If m'lord would be so good as to draw the
Salamander's attention? While you do,
I'll pick up a scale once it falls off.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Why not simply catch the creature
and peel off what you require?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well, that's a simply ridiculous idea.
Now go on with you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Will this suffice?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
This will do for now—although it
may prove rather difficult to drink.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I suspect they will find their throats
too choked with poison to register
additional complaint.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Zhu Ya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'm all right, Sister—although slightly
vexed we had to be saved by the Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
An utter disgrace, to be certain.
Now where is that squire!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I am here, m'ladies, and will accept
any punishment you deem fit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
As we hold some blame here, perhaps we can all
just agree to be more careful in the future.
In the meantime, continue honing your skills so
you might do more good for us witches of the red.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: It would be my pleasure, m'lady.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well then, Sister? Let us use the power of
the Salamander that rests within us to
cooperate and incinerate the Calamity
crystals which blanket our lands.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Quite so. We will begin at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Looks like it all worked out.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
They were not so foolish as to make attempts
on each other's lives after having wandered
so close to the abyss of death.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Guess we're back to watching, then!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
One of the Red Sage's little riddles, is it?
Well, perhaps I will pose one of my own:
the both of us went to retrieve a thing,
but ended up leaving a thing behind.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'm sure you can puzzle this one out, Watcher.
Once you know both what we went to get
and what was left behind, return here to me,
and I will make peace with my sister.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Riddle time, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Well? Did you solve the riddle?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Sublime king though I may be, I cannot
glean an answer from the exterior alone.
What manner of place is this tower?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Oh, pretty much what it looks like!
There's a fire spirit called the
Salamander in there.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: The riddle involves said spirit, then.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Oh, look! Fireproof gloves.
Two, in fact—one from each pair.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Guess they definitely came here to get
a scale from the Salamander, huh?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I will deal with the Salamander.
You collect the gloves and the scale.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Smart thinking. You got it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
That went great! Er, but I don't get why they
left the gloves here. I mean, how did they
plan to get the scale back without 'em?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Be that as it may, m'lady, I received no
countermanding orders. And as you know,
I am a squire, and the commands I receive
from witches are absolute. And with that, my duty is done.
Farewell to you both!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: No, wait!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
An unexpectedly dull ending to see the pair
of them slain; it would be far better for
them to attempt to kill each other forever.
Surely the assassin must carry an antidote?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The squires can never escape
the shadow of the witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So what, you're on the
assassin's side now?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The Dismal King is an ally to none.
This is merely a fine opportunity to
better know the darkness of this world.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well, well! The two of you clearly want an
antidote! Yet, did it ever occur to you—even
for a moment—that I might not have one?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
It did not have to.
I can see you have one.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
If there's one thing I loathe,
it's undeserved confidence.
That's enough of you, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
...Here. The antidote. It's made from a
scale of the Salamander, and should
revive flames that have been lost.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
This charade of reluctance is finished, then.
Indeed, you likely had no intention of killing
the witches from the start.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Tell that to the two witches who gave
my orders—orders that are absolute.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
But as I have managed to fulfill both
sets of orders, I now answer to no one—
and I will never relinquish this newfound
freedom! Never, I say! Huzzah!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Oh no! He jumped!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The man has earned his freedom now,
and none can stand in the way of it.
Come, we must away to the red sisters.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: ...Er, right.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: He is gone. Freedom is his.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
It saddens me to think I let such a brilliant
squire die in vain—and I swear here and now,
I will never permit such a thing again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Well, I guess it worked out...okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Adjudicate the nature of this outcome
for yourself after our battle with the
Calamity has passed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
What's Mother doing under the tree?
Oh, I don't like this at all...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Mother!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Are you all right!? Say something!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
The crystallization has
found its way here...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Nnngh...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: A fiend?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
This is Lita's familiar, Pierre.
What are you doing here, Pierre!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Pierre
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
!?
!
RIBBIT!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: You're...hungry?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ribbit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: BlueWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Croak croak.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ribbit! Ribbit!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: BlueWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Croak croak croak.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
This is an exercise in absurdity. Speak, creature!
I am aware you wish to convey something to us,
yet your mind is scattered here and there,
and not even the Dismal King can parse it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: If Lita were here, she'd definitely know what Pierre is trying to say.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Where is he taking us?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
We're heading under the Tree of the Forever Young,
to the place where its roots extend.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Wait, I can't go? Oh, c'mon!
How come this guy can go, but I can't!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
I will inspect the situation.
You will wait there.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Pieeerre! Whyyy!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: What do you seek?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
I see...crystallization. Mmm. Then you wished
us to know it has spread even so far as this, eh,
frog? Also, I assume you brought me down here
so I might destroy it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: So I shall do as you wish!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: The crystallization has returned.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Mmm. The crystals have encroached upon even
the tree's root system, and will use the castle's
power to regenerate no matter how many times
I send them to their ruination.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
I could destroy the crystallization by killing
the roots, but there's no telling what would
happen to the castle if I did that. Oh man,
what the heck are we supposed to dooo!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: You got an idea, Pierre!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Hey! Where you going!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: We must follow. Quickly!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Oh! He wants to use the
poison spring in the Bluewood!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Yet doing so may affect
the castle as well, no?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Well, it'd mess their stomachs up good if
witches or animals drank it, but since the
plants around here seem fine, I thiiink
the castle should be okay? But...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
But will the poison have
any effect on the crystals?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Well yeah, that's the thing. I mean,
Pierre seems pretty convinced, but a
familiar's just a familiar, ya know?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Hey, it's Lita! LITA!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Pierre, look! It's Lita! Er...but what
the heck is she doing? And how come
she doesn't seem to notice us?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
She imbibes the water of the spring.
Did you not say such a thing would
wreak havoc on a witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ribbit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Hang on... Hang ON! Oh my gosh,
have the two of them swapped BODIES!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Okay, so something weird happened beneath
the castle and the two of you ended up
swapping bodies—which explains why you
refused to let me go underground! Aw, thanks so much, Lita! If it wasn't
for you, I'd be a cat right now!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Is it okay to drink so much
poison spring water, Pierre?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
In that case, we should hurry back
to the castle and destroy the crystal.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
First, we soak the roots with
the poison spring water...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
The crystals' color has changed.
The poison has taken effect.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Now we just have to destroy them,
which I can totally handle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Curse you for sneaking up on the
Dismal King unawares, fiends!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ribbit!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
We must dispatch these fiends,
and with all speed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Are you prepared, frog?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Ribbit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Pierre!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Oh, Pierre! You protected my body!
You knew all of this would happen
and switched in order to protect me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: BlueWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
The Tree of the Forever Young has been revived.
Let us wield its youthful vitality to rid ourselves
of these crystals.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: And what of the frog?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Have a look!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Pierre
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: RIBBIT!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.text:
What becomes of the witches
in the crystallized castle?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.text:
Same as the castle:
they turn to crystal.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.text:
But we won't give up because we lost one
castle, so please keep watching over us.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.text:
We lost another castle to crystallization?
Damn it! I knew a battle with the Calamity
would be hard, but THIS hard...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.text:
No, Ameya! Don't give in to despair!
There's still hope!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.text:
A third castle, gone! We're gonna
lose to the Calamity at this rate!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.text:
It is of no consequence to me whether
the witches or the Calamity prevail
in the battle. However, if the crystallization continues
apace, it may prove difficult to find a
being suitable for my thrall—so perhaps
I ought to lend them my strength.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.text:
We lost a fourth castle. There's only
one left, so we have to protect it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.text:
One castle remains to you.
The true battle begins now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_040.text:
It's over... Every castle that protects
Pulchra has been consumed by crystal...

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text:
Mmm. With Ameya now disappeared,
I wonder what will become of Pulchra?
In any event, my watch is ended.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: UI
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text: You acquired a wood spirit's power.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text:
My Watcher's reward, I suppose.
I shall take it and go.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text:
Farewell to you, Pulchra,
world of the witches.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Where must I go as a Watcher?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
The Arch Witch said you could go anywhere
you like—apparently things will happen
just by your being there.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Then where I go and what I do falls to me
as the Watcher? If so, I shall continue to
enjoy the journey as my whims dictate.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Okay, but if that's the case,
what are Watchers even FOR?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Things appear to change even
in locations I do not visit.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Though all witches are fighting for our lives,
we don't fully understand the Calamity's power.
We just know we have to drive it back—
and that we're not going to lose!

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Then I shall maintain my watch.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Please do. This is a
battle for witches.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
What matters does the Arch Witch busy
herself with while the rest of her
fellows are engaged in battle?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
She keeps vigil in the Brilliant Tower,
ensuring that the balance of spirit
energy is maintained.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
And what of this tower
which shines so vexingly?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Mana gathers there from throughout the
Conjoined Worlds—that power is the only
reason witches even exist.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
And she then shares this
power with the witches?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Well, it's a little different than that. ...Actually, a lot different. ...Actually, completely different. But hey, you're the Watcher, not a witch. You don't really need to get it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
So if any of the witches lose their bases,
does the spiritual balance collapse?
Because it does not seem to have
much impact on the world.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Thankfully, the Arch Witch is in the
Brilliant Tower trying to minimize the
impact of that kind of thing—and her
power is SUPER impressive.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Ah, of course. The Arch Witch functions
as monarch of this world, and you witches
are her thralls.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Uh, that's not... No. You make it sound
like some sort of master-servant thing,
but it's not like that at all. Also, we're not fighting this battle because
she's ordering us to. Battling the Calamity
is just a thing witches do.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Such is the arrangement
in your world. I see.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
As I understand it, if you destroy all the
crystals, the witches will be victorious—
but if the world becomes blanketed by them,
the Calamity wins. Is this the sum of it?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Yup! But don't forget that witches have the
power to turn the tide in a single moment.
So long as we have even the slightest chance,
we can totally win this thing.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Fascinating. And you would
call that a witch's intuition?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: More like a witch's conviction.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text: Now where to begin my watch?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Just head off to wherever strikes
your fancy! Can't be in multiple
places at the same time, after all.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Surely a spell to double myself and
achieve just that would be a simple
enough thing for a witch?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
You're thinking of a ninja, buddy.
We're WITCHES.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
You all claim the Watcher is beckoned to
your world to bear witness to the fight
against the Calamity. Do people from the
outside never come to this place otherwise?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
I mean, sure? But it's pretty rare.
Pulchra's a pretty tough world
to get into, you know?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
It was fortuitous I was able
to come here, in that case.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text: That's why you're the chosen one!

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
I feel as though I have come to a deep
understanding of what you witches are.
And though in the heat of the Calamity,
it has not all been battle.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
I guess the Calamity woke something in us.
Stuff that wouldn't normally happen is...
Well, it's happening.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text: I wonder what will occur next?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
I know being the Watcher can make it feel like
you're just standing around watching stuff,
but this is serious business, so don't let the
other witches hear you talking like that.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text: I will handle it with delicacy.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
The battle wages on,
seemingly without end.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Yeah, and I think the witches might be wearing
out a little—but we can't whine or complain!
I mean, the enemy's a bunch of crystal, so it
won't be griping anytime soon, you know?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Are you unaccustomed to
protracted wars?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
It's more that I just like to finish
things quick and be done with it.
Personal preference, I guess.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Why do you continue
your vigil, Watcher?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Not for the reason you suspect, I am sure.
Being the Watcher is simply what is most
convenient for me at present.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Ah, but you have been deceived.
The Arch Witch's words are a curse,
one that has bound your very soul
to the task.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
You are a fool. I use the Arch Witch, just as
she uses me. It is a thing as natural as Yomi's
black sun—equally as natural as the way you
attempt to use me at every turn.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Uh, what's going on there, man?
You keep grinning like a weirdo.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Nothing that need concern you, witch.
I merely look forward to our journey.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Look, I generally like you, but please
try not to be Mr. Crazypants in front
of the other witches, okay?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
I do not hate all the witches.
On the contrary, one could say
I love each of them individually.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
The Arch Witch and sages, however, are a
different tale, for they are corrupt beings
that are neither great nor wise.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Without your strength, they would have
no chance of saving Pulchra. Therefore,
there is no value in aiding them.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
And there would be in aiding you?
No. I am content with my situation.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Then I will make it so you might
accomplish your goal immediately.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text: Then do it, if you can.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Whatever magics you may possess
cannot create that which I seek.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Man, you blurt out the WEIRDEST
stuff sometimes! I kinda love it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
The battle drags on.
Do we near its conclusion?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
Yeah, we're close. I can feel
the Calamity's power waning.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
And you would call that
a witch's intuition?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text: Will this war carry on forever?

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text: Victory is coming—I'm certain of it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_FUNC_SIUG_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text: Then I will trust in your certainty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_KENZOKU_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_KENZOKU_000_CUT_0.text:
Though you fascinate me, I cannot take you away.
So when Calamity strikes anew, let me witness
your radiance once more—for even when we are
apart, your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_KENZOKU_000_CUT_0.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_SIUG_AMYA_KENZOKU_000_CUT_0.text: Yes... I am with you forever...
